sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RENVERSE inverted, in heraldry, is when any thing is ſet with the head downwards, or contrary to its natural way of ſtanding. Thus, a chevron renverfé, is a chevron with the point downwards. They uſe alſo the ſame term when a beaſt is laid on its back.
